About Us
SECTION
TIDES SECTION
The Tides
width="450" height="300"
The Tides at Newport Bay Club
has only 39 homes, and all of these homes feature waterfront views. The Tides homes have
three to five bedrooms and 2,800 to 3,500 square feet of living space.
The homes in The Tides offer many luxury features, such as split bedroom configurations, dramatic volume ceilings, covered patios, family rooms and breakfast rooms to the breezy outdoors, lavish master suites with full-size walk-in closets, both Roman tub and stall shower, double vanity, huge, fully equipped gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, wood cabinetry and hi-hat recessed lighting, covered atrium. interlocking brick paver driveways and walkways and rolled tiled roofs, crown molding, and more.
ESTATES SECTION
The Estates
In The Estates at Newport Bay Club, a group of South Florida builders have pooled their design expertise to create an atmosphere of warmth and harmony. Homes are set back from the street on lavishly landscaped lots. Each site offers scenic views of the community's many lakes and waterways.
The Estates offers an old-fashioned neighborhood environment where people can feel comfortable raising their families and enjoying quiet leisure time after work.  The homes are both comfortable and elegant, with interior appointments designed to make family living easy.
Features include cut-coral fireplaces, European style gourmet kitchens, cathedral ceilings, Roman tubs in the master baths, oversized rooms, two- and three-car garages, and outdoor barbecue centers adjacent to pool and patio areas.
HAMPTON SECTION
END SECTION
Hampton Club
The Hampton Club at Newport Bay
was built in the early 1990's. This community was planned as a private enclave of single-family detached patio homes, offering Mediterranean-style architecture in one and two-story elevations.
The neighborhood maximizes privacy with individual entrance gates at each residence, and a dramatic privacy wall that marks the enclave's boundaries.
The Hampton Club at Newport Bay features 42 single family residences that range in size from 2157 sq ft up to 4677 sq feet, making Hampton Club an excellent choice for growing families or retired empty nesters, and everyone in between!
Copper Lake SECTION
Copper Lake
Copper Lake at Newport Bay Club
is the answer to the growing demand for contemporary, California-style living. Ceilings soar to heights of 23 feet. Generous use of sliding glass doors and clerestory windows maximize natural lighting, while lending an airy ambiance.
Copper Lake's selection of detached patio homes are attracting young families and retired couples alike.
